post.body: I do drop shipping with doba.being as I'm a truck driver & not at home.wish I was at home!cking jiggyjobs.com 2day...hmmm
can't wait to see what your next move will be. I'm sure it will be a good one.
speaking of shopping & xmas.I got 4 my folks,New York Times Complete Front Pages from 1851-2008.Lincoln assanation,ww1-2,etc..
Hugging strangers can be good, or maybe weird!! nice idea though!! lol..
there is a liquid to put on your windshield that repells water/snow,etc.find it at truck stops.
the movie babes in toyland was playing tonight on tv.Drew Barrymore & Keanu Reeves.
& everyone, I too want to wish you all a Merry Christmas & Happy New Year.
that sounds like a nice evening.I am looking forward to your next podcast.
Wow, that is so sad.I never like having any kind of guns where children can get to them. That is so sad.
sitting at wilco t/s,franklin,ga,i75x201.im me at yahoo im susan miller.nice sunny day 2day.sitting in dairy queen plugged into wall power.
lol lincoln assanation!can't spell!! lol.It's at amazon for $36 bucks.cool book.
trying to upload ptp152.painfully slow.buying tv shows on itunes.bored 2 snooze! working on ebay & affiliates today.
No Freight Today!!this is their mantra!!Updated MyYango.Com.What else can I do while I'm just sitting around??Staph is almost all gone!!
check out feedjit.com it's pretty cool. i've added it to www.myyango.com
i am following actor greggrunberg of heroes tv show, and following powersellingmom & ebaycoach on twitter here.yay!!
made a new podcast for my ebay & online biz hobby.beach bum entrepreneur podcast will be avail on itunes soon.it's on mypodcast.com
I got new pills yesterday 2 take with my antibiotics.It's a steroid type drug for my osteo arthritis & staph infection.It's helping good.
i'm following president obama on twitter, and some heroes tv cast members. yay!
using australian tea tree oil on bumps, and using airborne immune system booster made by a school teacher. good stuff.
4 days off, sitting in trk stop.pu load tomarrow.staph infection slowly healing.uploading ptp151 today.
DRIVERS BEWARE!! When u shower in public showers, wear footwear, and use your own towel and washcloth.staph infection can spread in public
I have sores all over my neck & body.I am at williamsburg,Va & walked around colonial district & took pics.uploading them to myspace..
I went 2 doctor 2day.I have MRSA-Staph Infection.He gave me the strongest antibiotic for it.He said it should clear up in a few days.
I found a place that has over 3000 channels of Satellite Tv for my Pc. It's a onetime low fee. Info at www.myyango.com I got it 4 my pc.
i think i fixed the mypodcast.com problem with listing my new episodes in itunes. direct download is http://ptp.mypodcast.com & subscribe
watched tv show from Fox called Secret Millionaire.Very good & moving show. I download it from iTunes.can catch it at home when i'm home!
we got a load going home!YaY!bought some whlse stuff online 2day.www.talkaboutit.org see if u can get anywhere w/it.?
ptp152 is now finally up and ready 4 download.happy holidays 2 u all.hope u are staying warm.gonna send xmas cards soon.ttyl!!
learned how to use new palm beach template in my ebay listings. looks cool. sitting,waiting for load.time 4 lunch & walk pups.ttyl.
instead of moving frieght with a truck, maybe I should move freight with my own ebay store inventory??!! lol..www.myyango.com yeah!!
check out www.tradekey.com and wholesaleboxlots.com and sitting around waiting for freight ho hum!! lol...
fox tv show "secret Millionaire" cool show.giving money or giving time,help,love,support.giving...works..giving is good.
sitting in sc,waiting 4 a load 2 florida 4 hometime.uploaded ptp152,now trying 2 post it.slow wifi connection.listening 2 pcasts.
Just uploaded ptp153, talk about Kennedy Space Center & more. And uploaded 37 pages, over 350 photos of Space center on myspace
i'm watching a show called "Rediscovered" on abc.I think it's better than American Idol.Shows them as kids auditioning, then years later.
will write 3 more ebooks and do 2 podcasts next couple days and post them.plus will post space center pics on myspace soon too..
sold 4 things over the weekend including my new ebook Ebay Business for Truckers. Listed a bunch of new things today.Cleaning out the house.
sold some stock 2day 2 make up for loss pay due to holiday,hometime,doc, and no freight!!things must get better soon.it just has to!!uuggh!
Tomarrow I see doc 2 get results from blood test & xray. Afterwards, I'm going to sell my 4 beach birdhouses at the yard sale area of town.
Cute Doggie Video. It takes a few min to load. http://www.kake.com/hattebergpeople/headlines/36548174.html
i just saw mike wilson aka 2drinksbehind on the news.he twittered about the plane crash, he was a passenger.
has been very slow.my paycheck is basically cut in half.I need 2 find more ways 2 make more cash to make up for less pay in job!!ughh.
oh, & my blood pressure was a tiny bit high 2day & I had a tiny little fever at doctor.She asked if I have alot of stress.I told her my job.
I'd like to say HI to my new recent followers.Aaron Moody,PowersellingMom,savvy seller,and all others..good 2 have u.
naptime for puppies.they were so excited 2 see me this morn when I picked them up from kennel.Glad 2 have them home w/me.I luv my pups.
tomarrow I will empty my BigRig/semi (work)truk of excess contents 2 make room 4 my little ebay inventory.Doing more laundry 2.good 2b home.
& signed my S corp papers.I'm all official.Now I'm finalizing my Ebay expenses for this year,2 submit 2 him b4 year end.
bumps didn't completely go away.i think if I had more pills, for longer period of time, they would not have come back.I also went 2 my cpa
went 2 doctor 2day.She did blood test,xrays,& good exam.Will find out results of blood test this wed when I go back.my staph infection....
